body:
1. The components has two different approaches. The results of shadingMask is based on patched sky but shadingMaskII tries to solve the problem geometrically. If you add to sky density then the results of shadingMask will be more similar to shadingMaskII.



2. Yes. You're right. This is a limitation and I should see if I can find a better solution for that. I think we need to split the overhead patch in couple of smaller patches to address this issue. Thanks for reporting > [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/165](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/165)



Mostapha
